title: Quick and easy vegetable noodle soup
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon sunflower or vegetable oil', '1 leek', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 (325g) bag mixed stir fry vegetables', '1L water, boiled', '1 teaspoon salt, to taste', '2 to 3 tablespoons dark soy sauce', '2 vegetable stock cubes', '300g uncooked noodles (or 400g cooked)']
